room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: We loved it. We were 2 adults and 4 kids and were able to get 8 A+ from the required 10. We played in the Playground room. Highly recommended. Your kids will love it.

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: Played playground with me and 2 friends and we had a blast, manger Kenny was so clutch giving us a couple more minutes since playground was meant for 12. Overall super dope experience, highly suggest

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: I really enjoy this place. I've come twice bringing my leadership team from work and also did my daughter's 13th birthday at the Playground room. The rooms are always surprising and super immersive. Decor and clues are well thought out and not easy. It does take almost the full 60 minutes to achieve. It seems expensive but it's a really fun and rewarding team building activity that I highly recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: Amazing! Melissa was so helpful and sweet! If you want to book ask for her she will answer any questions and concerns you may have!!!!!

room_title: Escape room "Playground" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: This location's rooms are all great! We did this room with 2 groups we didn't know and almost got out. This room takes a lot of communication and teamwork! The puzzles were fun and we had a great time.
